ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: You re a master beggar?  Do you actually get anything decent when you beg? Zopo on E Ci Master Baker Master Potter ... From:	Truitt, Darla/SEA
ygData.messageBody:
You're a master beggar? Do you actually get anything decent when you beg?
Zopo on E'Ci
Master Baker
Master Potter

-----Original Message-----
From: Truitt, Darla/SEA [mailto:dtruitt@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 5:03 PM
To: 'EQ_Potters@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials

<< File: image001.jpg >> Those should work. I have better
success with zombie skins, besides they
are stackable and light-weight. Any non-ruined SKIN (not
pelt) should work.
I have tried various animal skins with success.

I thought enchanters only needed regular vials. They use
lined too??

Tanana (Bristlebane)
Master Brewer
Master Potter
Master Beggar

-----Original Message-----
From: Carol Testa [mailto:caroljt@...]
Sent: November 23, 1999 2:46 PM
To: EQ_Potters
Subject: [EQ_Potters] Lined Vials




Does anyone know what type pelts are
needed to make
lined vials? I have been asked to make some for an
enchanter friend.

I have tried 1 lined Vial sketch,
one flask water, 1
small block of clay, and either a High Quality Bear skin or
a Zombie skin.



Chrysiana

Master Potter Cazic
Thule
